name: Death Toll
description: Death Toll is a multiplayer, open world first person survival shooter with a unique game mode that focuses on team play. Players are dropped into the world with nothing but their cunning, their will to survive, and the game's single goal: Escape the Island.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 8, 7 , Vista, XP,10 Processor: 3.0 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 10 or better with 4GB memory DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Direct X Compatible
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 8, 7 , Vista, XP,10 Processor: 3.7 Ghz+ Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 12 or better with 8GB memory DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Direct X Compatible
